statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM medical_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Heart Disease';
SELECT id, patient_name, patient_dob, medical_condition FROM medical_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM medical_records WHERE fraudulent_claim = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM medical_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM medical_records WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_dob ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_victims;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE id = 1;
SELECT diagnosis, amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance';
SELECT name, dob, medical_records FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT victim_id, diagnosis, amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT name, dob FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY insurance_provider DESC;
SELECT name, address, insurance_provider FROM identity_theft_victims JOIN insurance_claims ON identity_theft_victims.id = insurance_claims.victim_id;
SELECT claim_id, diagnosis, amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance' AND amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, name, dob, address, medical_records FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM stolen_medical_records;
SELECT thief_name, theft_location FROM identity_thieves;
SELECT claim_id, patient_name, claim_amount FROM fraudulent_claims;
SELECT insurance_provider, record_id FROM stolen_medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM stolen_medical_records;
SELECT * FROM stolen_medical_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Cancer';
SELECT thief_name, theft_location FROM identity_thieves ORDER BY thief_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Denied';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, insurance_provider FROM stolen_medical_records INNER JOIN fraudulent_claims ON stolen_medical_records.patient_name = fraudulent_claims.patient_name;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, ssn FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM insurance_info ORDER BY validity_date DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM fraud_history WHERE date_reported >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, policy_number, validity_date FROM insurance_info ORDER BY validity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_history WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, username, access_level FROM user_accounts WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, dob, insurance_provider FROM patient_records;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT hcp_name, hcp_location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY hcp_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fraudulent Activity';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, dob, insurance_provider FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, doctor_name, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT hcp_name, hcp_location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE hcp_location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT patient_name, dob, alert_type FROM patient_records JOIN fraud_alerts ON patient_records.patient_id = fraud_alerts.patient_id;
